name: ATOMIC BROTHERS!
description: Atomic Brothers, is a bomberman clone. Everything in the game is pretty much completed. 5 themed levels. 50 levels in total. 4 playable characters. I am in the middle of creating the pick ups and fixing the bombs. Thats the only issue I have with this in Game Maker. I havent been able to fix these issues yet. Rarely also. While bombing the random walls, the exit will not appear at all on some levels. Which may need a soft exit and restart. As ive been struggling with this the past few months. I have decided to wait a while to finish my Dizzy remake game, and come back to this later on when my brain decides to understand coding a little better. Work in progress. I will come back to this. Ive uploaded a version of the game I am currently at.
